com.poesys.bs.dto

Class CollectionBuilder<T,B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.dto.CollectionBuilder<T,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the input object type (DB DTO)
    B - the output object type (BS DTO)

    public abstract class CollectionBuilder<T,B>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract utility command class that generically builds a collection of objects of type B from a collection of objects of type T, given a conversion operation implemented in the concrete implementation of the abstract class. The output collection is a threadsafe object such as a CopyOnWriteArrayList.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

      • getCollection

        public java.util.Collection<B> getCollection(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
        Get a collection containing objects of type B based on the objects in a collection of objects of type T.
        Parameters:

        the collection of output objects

      • get

        public abstract B get(T dto)
        Get an object of type B based on an object of type T. The concrete subclass implements this with an appropriate constructor of type B, usually in a nested class: 
         private ConvertTest extends CollectionBuilder<ITest, ITest> {
   public ITest get(ITest dto) {
     return new BsTest(dto);
   }
 }
        Parameters:
        dto - the DTO of type T
        Returns:
        a DTO of type B
